original_text: And he overlaid the boards with gold, and made their rings of gold to be places for the bars, and overlaid the bars with gold.
korean_text: 그 널판들을 금으로 싸고 그 널판에 띠를 꿸 금 고리를 만들고 그 띠도 금으로 쌌더라

sentences.original_text: And he overlaid the boards with gold
and made their rings of gold
to be places for the bars
sentences.korean_translation: 그것들을 막대를 위한 장소로 삼기 위해

sentences.original_text: and overlaid the bars with gold
